title: Extent of women participating in Renaissance

content.question:
Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer.

To what extent and in what ways did women participate in the Renaissance?
